## Introduction

This vignette demonstrates how to retrieve and visualize financial time
series data from the Bank of Canada using the bocvaletR package.
Retrieve exchange rate data We retrieve the USD/CAD exchange rate from
the Bank of Canada Valet API.

```{r setup, message=FALSE}
library(bocvaletR)

```

```{r}
df <- boc_series(
"FXUSDCAD",
start_date = "2024-01-01",
end_date   = "2024-03-31"
)

head(df)

```

## Visualize the data

```{r}
boc_plot(df)

```

## Financial interpretation

The USD/CAD exchange rate reflects the relative value of the U.S. dollar
against the Canadian dollar and is widely used in international trade,
monetary policy analysis, and risk management.
